name: The Barren Era
description: The Barren Era is a 3D roguelike action-adventure survival game where the player can combine various body parts from different animals to create their own creature to survive in the barren world. The main mechanics is to collect body parts from different creatures and compose them with the player's own creature. Each body part has its own ability. Players need to think both creatively and strategically to build up a strong creature with powerful combinations of skills to fight against other creatures.
